=================
Connectives + BO
=================

mi je bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (connective (jek_bo))
    (selbri (word))))

=====================
Connectives JOI + BO
=====================

mi joi bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (connective (joi_bo))
    (selbri (word))))
